Text: RE db outage Cc Tradingpst David Wile is the dba that supports this database Hope he can help you out Bryan Original Message From Dronet David Sent Wednesday May PM To Lari Bryan Cc Williams Jason Tonks Colin Subject db outage Bryan We have a Web based application that access the oracle tns peoplesdev I receive the error ORACLE not available Im trying to find out who maintains the db where this and its production version lives to see if we can resolve the issue Any help you can provide is greatly appreciated Thanks Dave Dronet xt
